connect-upstream-to-downstream.title: 讓開源雲端與產品接軌: Take the Advantage and connect upstream to downstream
connect-upstream-to-downstream.intro:
提供經驗分享，關於如何正確的與雲端（OpenStack/K8S）社群接軌，利用社群力量注入雲端產品或實際雲端環境。
通常玩雲端科技相關的開源，都是有實際開發需求或是建構雲端需求。
從開發者角度加上產品開發者角度，如何讓自己接收開源並且讓融入社群。
connect-upstream-to-downstream.addition:
* Language: 漢語 / Mandarin Chinese
* Audience: 對雲端社群與產品對接有興趣的人。Anyone who has interest in Cloud Community
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門

Rico Lin.speaker: Rico Lin
Rico Lin.name: Rico Lin
Rico Lin.intro: OpenStack heat project team leader, Put a lot of effort on Cloud integration(OpenStack + K8S) and Cloud Application, Work @ EasyStack,
